title: why release Neeko when Ammumu or Eve play it better?
body: I just dont see any use this champ will have in this game, seems like a champion concept missing just that " CONCEPT" shes too weak to jungle, her STUN is charge up vs instant so easy to CC and cancel it, she turns invisible for 0.5 seconds when Eve can be perma invis by 6 or even shaco with his 3 second invis, I think Riot should stop and not press go with this one and rethink of a more concrete kit on her
